titleStmt.title: By the mayre for as much as in dyuerse good & auncient lawes and statutes of this our most drad soueraygne lord the Kynges realme of England, amongest dyuerse and sondry other thynges, forstalynge and regratynge, as two capitall and chefe euell myschefes ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.

notesStmt.note: Second pt. of title from first three lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
